QuestData.Title: Unbroken
QuestData.Description: We are preparing a ritual that may be of use in destroying Iso'rath, the old god bred abomination that the Twilight's Hammer have brought up from the depths. We are delayed though, for one of our strongest was captured during an assault on their encampment.$B$BEarthcaller Yevaa is within the ruins to the south. She is not dead. I am sure of it. Please, rescue her. If any of us is deserving of your aid, it is her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Earthcaller Yevaa within the Ruins of Drakgor.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank the elements that you've come. Did my brothers send you?
